summary: A young boy and his sister are drawn into one man's obsessive pursuit of his former lover.
cast: Rachel Weisz|Alessandro Nivola|Luka Petrusic|Labina Mitevska|Paul Popplewell|Ben Daniels|Graham Crowden|Geraldine O'Rawe|Steve John Shepherd|Phyllida Law|Mary MacLeod|Kenny Doughty|Des McAleer|Julian Rivett|Julie Smith|Matthew Bowyer|Berwick Kaler|Michael Rochester|Greg Saunders|David Fahm|Tameka Empson|Carmen Ejogo|David Hounslow|Dee Dee Menta|Etela Pardo|Louis Frost|Kathryn Fray
title: I Want You
